values.placeholder: what should happen on the video

assignments.name: COMFY_URL
assignments.value: ={{   ((u) => {   let s = u.trim();   if (!/^https?:\/\//i.test(s)) s = 'https://' + s;   const parts = s.split('/');   return parts[0] + '//' + parts[2]; })($json.comfyui_url)  }}

nodes.name: Wait until the video gets generated

conditions.leftValue: ={{ $json.keys().length > 0 && $json[$('Start the workflow with ComfyUI').item.json.prompt_id] && $json[$('Start the workflow with ComfyUI').item.json.prompt_id].status.completed }}

parameters.name: filename
parameters.value: ={{ $('Get video generation status').last().json[$('Start the workflow with ComfyUI').item.json.prompt_id].outputs.values().map(item => item.images).flat(Infinity).find(item => item.type === 'output').filename }}

parameters.name: subfolder
parameters.value: ={{ $('Get video generation status').last().json[$('Start the workflow with ComfyUI').item.json.prompt_id].outputs.values().map(item => item.images).flat(Infinity).find(item => item.type === 'output').subfolder }}

parameters.errorMessage: An error occoured while generating the image

assignments.name: workflow
negative_prompt
assignments.value: 色调艳丽，过曝，静态，细节模糊不清，字幕，风格，作品，画作，画面，静止，整体发灰，最差质量，低质量，JPEG压缩残留，丑陋的，残缺的，多余的手指，画得不好的手部，画得不好的脸部，畸形的，毁容的，形态畸形的肢体，手指融合，静止不动的画面，杂乱的背景，三条腿，背景人很多，倒着走
